alert.note: Alert for Colorado Springs Vicinity, Southern El Paso County, Rampart Range Below 7400 Ft; Pueblo Vicinity, Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 28 at 9:36PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central El Paso and north central Pueblo Counties through 1015 PM MDT... At 934 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over southeastern Colorado Springs, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts in excess of 50 mph and pea size hail. Colorado Springs observation at the airport of 53 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Southeastern Colorado Springs, Fountain, Hanover, Stratmoor, Fort Carson, Pueblo West, Pinon, Security, Security-Widefield, Cimarron Hills and Peterson Space Force Base. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Colorado Springs Vicinity, Southern El Paso County, Rampart Range Below 7400 Ft; Pueblo Vicinity, Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet
